about_the_game:
ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー

This work is a game created at Byking Co., Ltd. training for new employees.
It may not function properly depending on your PC environment.
Also, unintended problems may occur in the game.
Please take note of this.

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー

About this game


The main character, Wrench, uses her "Double Lariat" to defeat many enemies and make the show more exciting!

The audience can enjoy the game by defeating many enemies at the same time or by defeating them in a row.
The audience will get excited by defeating many enemies at the same time or by defeating enemies one by one.

You can also defeat the audience, but be aware that your score will be deducted.

Story


I'm Wrench-chan! I love mechanics and I work as an engineer!



I wanted to test the durability of the machine.

I wanted to test the durability of the hand armor I had developed.
One day, I was invited to participate in a certain show!

It's a show where the more double lariat you do, the more the audience grows!

So cute!

Appearing on the show
If I can gather a large audience, it will be a great chance for everyone to know about my technical skills!

I'm still practicing the double lariat.
Sometimes I get dizzy when I spin around too much... but I'm sure it will be fine!

It will blow away all the other performers and make it the best show ever!

-SUPER LARIAT SHOW TIME! !

Performer

You're at the show just like me!
There are some unique performers that aren't easy to blow away, so be careful!

.

Audience SYSTEM

Let's blow up the performers and get the audience excited!
If the conditions are met, they will flip a coin!

Double Lariat Action

Surprise the performer with my Double Lariat
Drift on the ground, spin action in the air



Fever Gauge

If you keep spinning or get coins...
My deadly Fever Lariat will explode
Let's blow the performers away together

Results SYSTEM

How much excitement was there at the venue?
A rank will be displayed based on the excitement of the audience!
Aim for rank S!

name: DABULARI

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel i7 6770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 980
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: ”Double Lariat” Action GAME Blow away various enemies Wrench-chan's show starts now!
